mapper.select: SELECT MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_PW, MEMBER_PHONE, PROFILE_PATH, REAL_PROFILE_PATH, 'ROLE_' || MEMBER_GRADE member_grade, CON_IP, job_id, dept_id, (SELECT job_name FROM job WHERE job_id = member.job_id) job_name, (SELECT dept_name FROM department WHERE dept_id = member.dept_id) dept_name, EMP_STATUS, CON_STATUS, COMPANY_ID, LOGIN_FAIL, LOGIN_LOCK, MAIL_KEY, MAIL_AUTH, COMPANY_ACCP FROM member WHERE company_id = #{companyId}
